title: Did Tiffany Chokers Originate as Slave Collars?
subtitle: Tiffany & Co. never made or sold slave collars, and a viral image of a slave collar is not from an exhibit at the National Museum of African American History and Culture in Washington, D.C.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: An image depicts a Tiffany-made slave collar on display at the National Museum of African American History and Culture in Washington, D.C.
